Available immediatelyBackground & Job Description:dot.LA is the premier source for news about and community for the Los Angeles tech and startup ecosystems community . Launched in 2020 and backed by top VCs and angels, dot.LA serves an audience of hundreds of thousands founders, investors, and operators with media and a robust live events package.We are looking for a Platform and Analytics Manager who will oversee the distribution of dot.LA content across multiple channels including content management systems, social platforms, and third party platforms. The Platform and Analytics Manager will also analyze metrics measurement and audience data to help inform editorial decisions. Special initiatives and new editorial projects will be led by the Production Manager.The successful candidate will be a teambuilder with deliberate communication and task management skills. A keen editorial sensibility and the ability to drive results in a startup environment are paramount.Duties & Responsibilities:Leverage data analytics to create actionable audience insightsOversee daily web production and distribution of dot.LA articles, podcasts, and videos in collaboration with editorial teamImplement necessary changes and improvements to dot.LA websites and platformsManage relationships with third-party vendors (content management systems, audience tracking, etc.)Drive the development of new platforms and products Skills & Experience:Demonstrated experience developing new digital productsAt least 2 years of experience at a media organization in a product/platform capacityFluency with content management systems and web development platforms (RebelMouse, Asana, Zendesk Parse.ly, Webflow, Trello familiarity a plus)Excellent interpersonal skills and ability to drive results in a startup environmentFamiliarity with basic web development languages (html, css and javascript) is a plus.This is a full-time position with benefits, working remotely but will be based in Los Angeles.Powered by JazzHRU9zKcYF7Sf
